title: Quiz - Adverbs of Frequency
description: Quiz sur les adverbes de fréquence et leur placement correct

questions.question: Where should 'always' go in this sentence: 'I ___ wake up ___ early ___'?
questions.explanation: Adverbs of frequency go BEFORE the main verb: 'I always wake up early'.

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
questions.explanation: With verb 'to be', the adverb goes AFTER: 'She is always late'.

questions.question: Put these adverbs in order from least frequent to most frequent:
options: never, rarely, sometimes, often, usually, always
always, usually, often, sometimes, rarely, never
sometimes, never, rarely, often, usually, always
never, sometimes, rarely, often, always, usually
questions.explanation: Correct order: never (0%) → rarely (10%) → sometimes (50%) → often (70%) → usually (90%) → always (100%).

questions.question: Complete: 'My brother ___ never ___ breakfast.'
questions.explanation: 'Never' already makes it negative, so no auxiliary needed: 'My brother never eats breakfast'.

questions.question: Which frequency adverb means about 70%?
questions.explanation: 'Often' represents about 70% frequency on the scale.
